name: Sand Drag Pro Rider
description:
Thrill-Enthusiasts of the world – Rejoice! It’s time for adrenaline-pumping game that takes place on some of the planet’s most awe-inspiring offroad tracks! Control your Sand Drag on this amazingly difficult offroad terrains.If you are afraid of dizzying heights and awesome speeds, you’d better play another game.However, if you’re interested in conquering these absolutely massive Offroad Terrains This game is for you.

Features:
* Missions which will give you a tough competition.
* Addictive Experience.
* Easy Game Play
* Real Animations And Physics
